chatbot.evidence: The complaint mentions Tobi, which is a chatbot.
chatbot.description: The customer is unhappy with the chatbot's inability to resolve their issue and not providing an option related to their problem.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's functionality to better understand and address customer issues.

complaint.description: The customer is complaining about network issues that have not been resolved since Sunday evening, which may result in job loss due to a virtual interview.
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the network issue promptly to prevent any negative impact on the customer's job prospects.

meta.review_content:
Tobi is one of the worst ideas Vodacom could ever have. My issue could not be resolved as the stupid robot does not give an option with my issue! I was not even given a chance to speak to an actual consultant so that my actual problem could be resolved.

I have a virtual interview and if i cannot get in touch with the interviewers because of network issues, since that was the problem i was trying to resolve (which has been since Sunday evening 30/01/22) I will find a way to sue Vodacom for job loss because this is ridiculous really!
